title: S&P 500 Heads For Best Day Since May as Tech-Stock Rout Eases
description: US stocks rebounded on Friday, as dip buyers capitalized on the artificial intelligence-fueled plunge and the Dow Jones Industrial Average rose past 50,000 points for the first time.
content: US stocks rebounded on Friday, as dip buyers capitalized on the artificial intelligence-fueled plunge and the Dow Jones Industrial Average rose past 50,000 points for the first time.
